WorkItem.Description:
Hi
 
On a new machine with .NET 4 and VS 2010 and no previous versions of either, I just tried to build the ProjectLinker and got a host of errors which boiled down to the following:
 
Could not resolve this reference. Could not locate the assembly "Microsoft.VisualStudio.QualityTools.UnitTestFramework, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL". Check to make sure the assembly exists on disk. If this reference is required by your code, you may get compilation errors.	
 
Microsoft.Practices.VisualStudio.UnitTestLibrary
 
I resolved it by setting SpecificVersion to False.
WorkItem.Summary: Could not locate the assembly "Microsoft.VisualStudio.QualityTools.UnitTestFramework, Version=9.0.0.0..."

Comments.Message:
Hi,

Thank you for reporting this. We’ve been able to reproduce the exception you’re mentioning, and also used the fix you’ve proposed and after that verified that it worked. The Prism team has been notified of this and might include a fix on a future version.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
